entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Add `IReadOnlyList<TElement>` to System.Linq.Grouping<TKey, TElement> #92165
  • [Perf] Triage backlog #92164
  • [PERF] Regressions in WASM AOT x64 in Logging.Formatting and IndexOf #92163
  • [PERF] Regression in Math.Single and Char_IsLower Benchmarks on Ubuntu Arm64 #92162
  • [PERF] Windows x86 Regression in BilinearTest.Interpol_AVX #92161
  • System.IO.Directory.GetFiles with System.IO.SearchOption.AllDirectories not working on network drive #92152
  • ConfigurationBinder source generator shouldn't generate empty methods #92151
  • AzDo uploading failure: "Blob is incomplete" #92148
  • Support direct P/Invokes without an import library. #92140
  • ConfigurationBinder source generator throws on an abstract member rather than binding to existing value #92137
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add static factory methods for collections in System.Collections.Generic #92133
  • ILLink analyzer doesn't warn for attributes on fields/properties/events #92131
    Future
  • RandomNumberGenerator bad performance on GetString and possible reason #92130
    Future
  • [mono][ios] Tests failing 'JIT_SIMD' on ios/tvos devices #92129
    9.0.0
  • .Net 8 RC1 WASM - compatibility - lack of support for older systems #92117
  • Uninstalling windows hosting bundle not working #92115
  • Why DOTNET_GCHeapHardLimitPercent not working? #92113
  • "dotnet nuget" results in "Internal CLR error" #92146
  • `TypeLoadException` has no message when issued from a single file app #92111
  • [mono] mono_gc_init_finalizer_thread #92110
  • NativeAOT compilation issue on IOS ARM64 - losing interface members? #92106
  • [API Proposal]: Provide a configurable overload of MemoryCacheEntryOptions for the commonly used method GetOrCreate in MemoryCacheExtension #92101
  • Can't build large webassembly project in .net8 in Release/AOT #92100
  • Test failure Loader/binding/tracing/BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow/BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow.sh #92098
    9.0.0

Closed

  • [Xamarin.Android] Performance regression between net7 and net8 #89880
    8.0.0
  • Port System.Text.Json documentation for .NET 8.0 APIs #88577
    8.0.0
  • ILLink reports duplicate warnings from properties in some cases #83581
    Future
  • dotnet publish command fails with error NETSDK1144: Optimizing assemblies for size failed #92064
    8.0.0
  • [area-Tools-ILLink]: Error IL1012: IL Trimmer has encountered an unexpected error #91880
    8.0.0
  • App hangs on macOS / Apple Silicon when run under Rosetta #76356
    Future
  • Remotely debugging .NET 7 apps in linux-arm environments causes segmentation fault #81921
    8.0.0
  • [Proposal]: Make MemoryStream use an unrolled linked list as the internal buffer #92078
  • P/Invoke doesn't work after CharSet.Unicode is set #92105
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2021-41355 | .NET Core Information Disclosure Vulnerability #60301
    5.0.0
  • UnsafeAccessorAttribute crashes with exit code 139 #92104
  • [API Proposal]: Expose `System.Text.Json.JsonSerializer.GetTypeInfo` #90852
    Future
  • [Http Metrics] Replace http.error.reason with OTel standard error.type #91909
    8.0.0
  • Config binder generator generates uncompilable code when a private nested type is used #90909
    8.0.0
  • JSON serialization -- int to string. -- exception #92091
  • Test failure profiler/gc/nongcheap/nongcheap.sh #91976
    9.0.0
  • Additional read from memory when reading a field in a struct #92093

PullRequests

Created

  • Add attribute analysis for missing cases in ILLink analyzer #92166
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/8.0] Fix URL for syslib diagnostics #92160
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2268640 #92159
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add a few missing xml comments for APIs in threading and tasks #92157
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.0
  • Address some `SString` const issues #92156
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [workloads] Opt into using package groups #92155
    needs-area-label
  • Add remaining set of TensorPrimitives APIs for .NET 8 #92154
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/8.0] Avoid marking property/event attributes multiple times #92153
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • add packaging for linux-musl #92145
    NO-MERGE, area-System.IO
  • [release/8.0] Fix support of FromKeyedServicesAttribute in ActivatorUtilities.CreateFactory #92144
    blocking-release, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, 8.0.0
  • 6 more naive methods for Tensor Primitives. #92142
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/8.0] [NativeAOT] Fix iOS library build by linking standard C++ library by default #92141
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Fix type parameter mapping logic in ILLink/ILCompiler #92139
    area-Tools-ILLink, needs-area-label, 8.0.0
  • Set severity of rule CA1870 to warning #92135
    area-Meta, 9.0.0
  • Check if bbNatLoopNum is not NOT_IN_LOOP #92132
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] Add link to docs to interop error messages #92125
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Initialize jitstdout lazily #92123
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Improve binder gen binding logic (init, member binding, polymorphism) #92118
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Extract all side effects of the index in optRemoveRangeCheck #92116
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Fix iOS library build by linking standard C++ library by default #92114
    os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Add some convenience classes for node count JIT metrics, and automatic dumping from compShutdown #92112
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement StoreVector128x2 for Arm64 #92109
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [mono][infra] Disable failing apple mobile tests #92108
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Atomics #92102
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv

Merged

  • Fix support of FromKeyedServicesAttribute in ActivatorUtilities.CreateFactory #92082
    blocking-release, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, 8.0.0
  • Fix URL for syslib diagnostics #92134
    needs-area-label
  • Start running test added in #89061 #91780
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] [NativeAOT] Switch macOS to mmap thunks like iOS platforms #92136
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Avoid marking property/event attributes multiple times #92094
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Add missing STJ xml docs #92138
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [release/8.0] fix ReceiveFrom with dual mode socket #92103
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Sockets, 8.0.0
  • Fix type parameter mapping logic in ILLink/ILCompiler #92088
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/8.0] Implement support for `InlineArray` in the trimmer #92107
    Servicing-approved, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] [browser] ENVIRONMENT_IS_WEB is also true on WebWorker #91627
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • [wasi] Generate scripts to run with node. #92099
    arch-wasm, os-wasi
  • [wasm] Update installation process of nodejs 18.x to move away from the #92069
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, perf-pipeline
  • Remove unnecessary use of UseCompilerGeneratedDocXmlFile #91935
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0] Update FixupPrecode and StubPrecode types for ARM #92075
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2267864 #92090
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Implement support for `InlineArray` in the trimmer #92060
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • fix ReceiveFrom with dual mode socket #92086
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 9.0.0
  • Add SHUTDOWNGUARD to NonGcHeapProfiler::ObjectAllocated #92096
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr

Updated

  • Make config binding gen incremental #89587
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Use `isinst` in `System.Data.Common.ObjectStorage:Set` #91945
    area-System.Data, community-contribution
  • Implement Linq AggregateBy method for IEnumerable and IQueryable #92089
    area-System.Linq, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix: Config binder generator doesn't generate code when named arguments are out of order #91961
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • [wasm] Migrate from catch_all to catch in the jiterpreter and destroy exceptions #91364
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [wasi] Add AOT compiler build to the official build #92095
    area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Unify and clean up unspilling #91663
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Check if loop body occured before loopTop and if so unmark alignment #91918
    Servicing-approved, blocked, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Remove public provider from rundown session #92048
    Servicing-approved, area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [PERF] Add hybrid globalization testing runs #89825
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Use runsettings.targets to generate runsettings for host tests in local builds #92083
    area-Host
  • Add package readmes #91210
    area-Meta, 8.0.0
  • [Mono] Enable IL trim for WASM apps by default #90436
    area-Build-mono
  • Move GetMethodTable and IsReference to JIT #88860
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • Reenable consumption of PGO data #91297
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [WIP] Unified intrinsics emission front-end experiments #91993
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono
  • [mono][infra] Use llvm toolchain instead of binutils on linux #92057
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • WIP: [mono] Clean up internal usage of `RuntimeComponents` to always be treated as MSBuild Item #91800
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono][llvm] Prevent method to LLVM function mapping where possible #88914
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Use strategy in StrategyBasedComWrappers.ComputeVtables #92085
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • Format/Parse binary from/to BigInteger #85392
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [wasi] Fix WasmLinkIcalls and WasmNativeStrip support. #91843
    area-Build-mono

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-15
entry.content:
PullRequests

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Stop generating catch funclets #2399
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Emit object nodes as structs not arrays to allow for unaligned relocs. #2401
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • NativeAOT-LLVM Merge sep 23 #2396
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support for new Workload Set Versions #35455
    8.0.2xx
  • Add InstalledWorkloadPacks to WorkloadHistoryRecord #35452
  • SDK shouldn't upload manifest separately when uploading tags. #35431

Closed

  • Unsafe.AsRef<ReadOnlyStruct>(in ReadOnlyStructInstance) missing in .NET 8 RC1, No documentation regarding the breaking change #35427
  • [NETE2ESDK][Loc][Regression]With VS 17.7 preview 2 + net 8 preview 5, Out of support warning for net5.0/netcoreapp 3.1/netcorapp2.1 projects is unlocalized on Japanese OS. #32592

PullRequests

Created

  • Add net7 wasm workload to the recognized list #35457
    untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #35454
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Trigger enhanced page nav on hot reload #35450
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Create default.json file (targeted at 8.0.100) #35446
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add explicit reference to Microsoft.SourceBuild.Intermediate.templating #35441
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Add explicit dependency on Microsoft.SourceBuild.Intermediate.templating for SourceBuild #35440
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #35432
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Metrics switch support in the SDK #35418
    area-runtime, untriaged, 8.0.1xx
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.1xx #35407
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Add workload #35451
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, 8.0.1xx
  • Add workload #35444
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, .NET 8.0
  • Containers: don't push manifest digest when pushing manifest tags. #35437
    untriaged, Area-Containers

Updated

  • Download tool packages from NuGet feeds directly, instead of implicitly restoring #33835
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Side by side workload manifests and garbage collection for file based installs #35106
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [main] Update dotnet/runtime #35048
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Workload history #34946
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Write the full path of the dotnet tools directory in /etc/paths.d/dotnet-cli-tools #35411
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Find dotnet.exe from VS's MSBuild #35409
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Fix possible NullReferenceException due to &/&& typo #35026
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • Add workload version subcommand Fixes #33912 #33996
    untriaged, Area-Workloads

entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Collection expressions: construction #7541

Updated

  • Collection expressions: implicit collections in spreads and foreach #7534

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Implement code mapper #69967
  • Tracking issue to ensure any mitigations we make for out of sync source-generators get removed. #69964
  • Overload resolution doesn't work with collection expressions #69962
  • StructLayout And MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.ByValArray)Memory layout error when using two attributes simultaneously #69960

Closed

  • High CPU Utilization with Very Basic Keypresses #66410
    17.6
  • Collection literal with custom types not working #69950

PullRequests

Created

  • Add support for collection expressions in attributes #69968
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.8
  • Add mitigation in 17.7 for cases where local and remote host disagree on source generated files. #69965
    Area-IDE, untriaged, OnDeckForServicing
  • Add inline parameter hints keywords to VSPackage.resx #69963
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Speicfy System.Private.Uri and System.Net.Http versions #69959
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Dev/toddgrun/revert 769dfa13624dae1bbba1afbdfaeb85f928843004 and use multi dictionary pool #69896
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Replace InterceptorsPreview with InterceptorsPreviewNamespaces=global #69848
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Temp fix to bring vsmac package #69966
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Refactoring of synthesized types tracking across EnC generations #69782
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Do source-generation only in our OOP process. #69917
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Include a bit in DocumentId to indicate if it corresponds to a SG document or not #69952
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Add new endpoint in roslyn to get token for multiple ranges #69946
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Check constructor for conversion to IEnumerable collection #69956
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.8
  • Collection expressions: avoid intermediate List<T> if spread elements have known length #69875
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Create a brokered service to delegate loading of projects to us #69857
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • EnC: Parameter and property analysis #69774
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • EnC: Generate correct state mapping for methods containing await foreach #69806
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve generic type argument list error recovery #69734
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Implement find all references to preprocessing symbols #66425
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.9
  • Remove unnecessary feeds #69928
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Perform a null check for a pattern-based fixed statement over nullable value type. #69957
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use no-op global assembly cache helper when running under .net core #69936
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Make ManagedToolTask.PathToManagedTool virtual #69958
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Blazor NET.8] Add global option for disable pre-rendering #50744
  • Persisting Data Across SSR and Blazor Server #50741
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly.DevServer 7.0.10 results in Unbounded Breakpoints for swa cli #50740
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose #50739
  • Content security policy issue for embedded browser(chromium) in Blazor Web assembly .js file with eval() #50738
  • RC1 Blazor Web App NavMenu Has Double Icons When Importing Bootstrap Icons Script In Head #50737
    8.0
  • Hot reload not working with WASM components in Blazor 8RC1 component #50735
  • StreamRendering on first page continue to render after navigation #50733
  • Should we disable asp0014 when using `WebApplication.CreateEmptyBuilder()` #50732
  • .Net 8 RC1 WASM - compatibility - lack of support for older systems #50729
  • Consider updating `InputFile` to support `@bind` expression so it can auto-generate the name attribute #50728
  • Allow to parse 1 to boolean for SupplyParameterFromQuery attribute in Blazor app #50726
  • Azure AD B2C and Blazor Web App Net8 Authentication #50725
  • Blazor component passed as cascading parameter is null when used in MainLayout.razor (.NET 8.0 RC 1) #50724

Closed

  • Access additional services in Program.cs not working #38326
    8.0-rc2
  • Spruce up `OpenApiResponse` creation in `Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi` package #41243
    Backlog
  • Docs - Minimal API Basics #44256
    7.0.0
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #50714
  • Event handlers in layout do not seem to fire in a .NET 8 RC1 blazor application #50712
  • Incorrect swagger.json definition for GET endpoints in Minimal API when using Keyed Services #50704
    8.0-rc2
  • dotnet publish appears to be using an incorrect base container with DN8RC1 #50718
  • [SignalR-Client-Cpp] Fails in start() when there is no network connection #50698
  • Failed to load Blazor WebAssembly project in Production after upgrading to .NET 8 RC1 #50719
  • Blazor Web App --> NavigationManager doesn't navigate without `forceLoad` #50691
    8.0-rc2
  • [Blazor] Add support for onclose event for dialog #50513
    8.0-rc2
  • The Client project of the Blazor Web App template should also have a Components folder #50645
    8.0-rc2
  • Add automated Blazor Hybrid test #50193
    8.0-rc2
  • C# Dev Kit for VS Code missing controller based API project template. #49617

PullRequests

Created

  • Update IAcceptsMetadata docs to reflect behavior of matcher policy #50747
    Docs, area-minimal
  • Retry stateful reconnect attempts #50745
    area-signalr
  • Port Blazor Hybrid Photino test to release/net8 #50743
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor] Prerendered state #50742
    area-blazor
  • Update SDK version #50734
    area-infrastructure
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `8a6feab` to `d1467f5` #50731
    area-infrastructure
  • Resolve CVE-2021-43877 #50723
    area-infrastructure
  • Add Identity Components to Blazor template #50722
    area-mvc

Merged

  • [Blazor] APIs to preserve content between enhanced navigations #50437
    area-blazor, 8.0-rc2
  • Support resolving form files in complex form mapping #50537
    area-blazor, 8.0-rc2
  • Add automated Blazor WebView test using Photino #50347
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0-preview1
  • Blazor: add support for onclose event #50727
    area-blazor, 8.0-rc2
  • Blazor Web project interactive options improvements. Rename render modes. #50684
    area-blazor, 8.0-rc2
  • Enable build acceleration #50205
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 9.0-preview1
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2267489 #50713
    area-mvc, 9.0-preview1
  • Fix XML docs on Redis OutputCaching extensions #50716
    area-networking, area-middleware, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #50695
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
  • Use ArgumentException.ThrowIfNullOrEmpty #50666
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Persist Prerendered State #50625
    area-blazor
  • Replace ''return'' with lambda expression ''=>''. #50711
    area-identity, community-contribution
  • Use generated PInvokes and exchange types #50685
    area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Ambiguity Between IView.Arrange() and VisualElement.Arrange() #17417
  • CarouselView does not work at all #17416
  • Error while setting up the Android emulator from Android Device Manager in Visual Studio #17415
  • Default styling for controls does not work! #17414
  • .NET 8 RC1 Unable to set Button TextColor #17413
    .NET 8 GA
  • Incorrect Labels Margin in Grid when the Margin is Small #17408
  • iOS app crashes on startup after distributing through TestFlight #17405
  • .NET 8 : Windows CollectionView is displayed as Grid Layout even if it should be List if initially the collectionView is not visible #17400
    .NET 8 GA
  • NuGet Automatic Package Restore fails when targeting .net7.0 and platformspecific propertys in csproj #17398
  • [.NET8] MAUI crashing on CarouselView render/remove, flyout menu #17396
    .NET 8 GA
  • [MAUI]All options are only visible when you click them for the first time. #17395
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • [VSCode][MAUI]The App hang after pulling down the RefreshView C2 page on iOS and My Mac target. #17394
  • [VSCode][MAUI]The Refresh spinner arrow is not displayed centered on iOS target. #17392
  • [regression/8.0.0-rc.1.9171] [MAUI] The App crashes after pulling up and then pulling down the RefreshView C6 page #17391
    .NET 8 GA
  • Shell: Page bottom padding not calculated properly while opening a non-tabbed page from a tabbed page and coming back to the tabbed page #17390
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Setting InputTransparent=true on a layout will remove the background #17389

Closed

  • Cannot Build MAUI Blazor Android App when Referencing a Blazor WebAssembly Project #16782
  • ResourceDictionary.ContainsKey method is not working correctly #15110
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.7.8842] Maui Hybrid App stuck on "Loading..." in release mode on Android #17130
  • Label and ImageButton in Grid - Clicked doesn't fire on Android or iOS, works fine in Windows #17384
  • Image AspectFill not working #6378
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.2.7871] AppThemeBinding in VisualState prevents from updating Button.Background #16960
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/8.0.0-rc.1.9171] XAMLC is currently throwing exceptions in RC1 that don't appear to have been throwing in PReview7 #17333
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.5.8529] invalid GradientBrush color causes crash #15667
    .NET 8 GA

PullRequests

Created

  • Backport uitests #17420
  • Merge main into net8.0 #17419
  • Cleanup SwipeView and Propagate BC until we can fix compat layout #17418
  • Merge net8.0 into main #17412
  • Add .editorconfig to Core for specifying CA rules #17411
  • Remove code from swipe view that kept recreating and re-assigning SwipeItems #17410
    .NET 8 GA
  • Enable .NET 7 <MauiVersion> to work in .NET 8 SDK projects #17409
    .NET 8 GA
  • [ci] Bump stable versions on main #17407
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 8 GA
  • Bump the androidx group with 14 updates #17401
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • [tizen]Bump Tizen to rc2 packages #17399
  • passing test for #16960 #17397
  • [X] fix CollectionItems enumeration #17364
    .NET 8 GA
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #17388
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Bump the aspnetcore group with 7 updates #17345
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget, .NET 8 GA
  • Update the macios dependencies to new package names. #17267
    .NET 8 GA
  • Increase timeouts to 4 hours #17386

Updated

  • [Android] Fix ScrollView filling layouts #17243
    area/layout 🔲, platform/android 🤖, layout-scrollview, Under Consideration
  • Fix iOS/Win InputTransparent layouts and add several UI tests #17286
    .NET 8 GA
  • Remove reference to concrete native host app #16803
    area/hosting 🧩, community ✨, stale, Under Consideration

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.ArgumentException on List<T> with OwnsOne ToJson #31760
  • Much needed #31754
  • TPC does not work "out of the box" with Sqlite #31752
  • Ef Core RC1 Sql Server Compiled Model Stackoverflow #31751
  • dotnet ef migrations bundle ignores --no-build argument #31750
  • Owned type not working when referenced from entity with inheritance #31749

Closed

  • Exception doing object equality on value types mapped as complex types #31610
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Make expression methods of list comparer private since they are not now needed for the compiled model #31758
  • Throw better exception when attempting to map a read-only collection as a primitive collection #31755

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #31761
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • SqlServer: Rename IsSortedInTempDb to SortInTempDb #31757
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #31756
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Allow generating EF.Property over struct #31753
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #31738
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Updated

  • [release/7.0] Fix to #29638 - GroupBy generates invalid SQL when using custom database function #31743
